meanings.definition: A type of trout found in North American rivers.
meanings.sent1: The steelheads swam gracefully in the river.
meanings.sent2: We caught a few steelheads during our fishing trip.
meanings.sent3: The steelheads decided to have a race downstream.
meanings.sent4: The shimmering steelheads were like silver arrows in the water.
meanings.sent5: The children were amazed by the beauty of the steelheads.

meanings.definition: The plural form of steelhead, referring to multiple fish of this species.
meanings.sent1: Look at all the steelheads swimming together!
meanings.sent2: The steelheads were a sight to behold in the river.
meanings.sent3: The steelheads threw a party to celebrate their reunion.
meanings.sent4: The steelheads moved in unison, like a silver wave.
meanings.sent5: The fishermen were excited to catch so many steelheads.
